name: European Microfinance Network aisbl
goal:
- to promote self-employment, micro-enterprise and the supply of micro-finance services including micro-credit, any other micro-finance service such as but not limited to, micro-insurance, personal credit, micro-securities, micro-payment and all other related services in Europe
- to support the development of micro-finance programs and micro-finance institutions
- to develop and strengthen the technical support to training and information programs
- to increase knowledge about microfinance, particularly on good practices in this field
- to establish and improve a regulatory framework for micro-finance and self-employment in the European Union and in the Member States
- to represent the Association and its members before the institutions and organizations related to the microfinance sector in Europe
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Environment, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Home Affairs, Internal Market, Regional Policy, Youth
euInitiatives:
EaSI Programme
Microfinance definition at EU level
Employment policies, mainly self-employment and entrepreneurship
Financial inclusion
Regulatory framework for microfinance in Europe
